titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Navy to name the next available Naval vessel after United States Marine Corps Sergeant Rafael Peralta.
To direct the Secretary of the Navy to name the next available Naval vessel after United States Marine Corps Sergeant Rafael Peralta.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Seapower and Projection Forces.

bill.summary: Directs the Secretary of the Navy to name the next available Naval vessel after U.S. Marine Corps Sergeant Rafael Peralta.
